decision_conditions: The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

<p class="MsoNormal" style="">The development hereby
permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans
and documents:</p><p class="MsoNormal">Site
Location Plan; Lavaastu2024/413/02 - Existing and Proposed Site Plans; Lavaastu2024/413/03
- Existing Floor Plans; Lavaastu2024/413/04 - Existing Elevations; Lavaastu2024/413/05
- Proposed Floor Plans; Lavaastu2024/413/06 - Proposed Elevations; Design and Heritage Statement; Fire Safety â€“ Reasonable Exemption Statement (received
02.10.24)</p><p class="MsoNormal">All plans received 09.08.24&nbsp;unless
otherwise stated</p>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey rear extension; front porch; external alterations
